name: Game.file Is Corrupted
description:
My entry for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 

Game.file is a game about an incomplete game with a lot of bugs and errors.  It's your personal duty to get rid of these errors, in a way or another...

Explore and find the errors, but mind...    

The more you play, the less you see.

WASD to move, LMB to shoot.
